revisions.rev:
{{Wiktionary|wanted}} {{selfref|On Wikipedia, "Wanted" may refer to [[Wikipedia:Most wanted articles]]}} '''Wanted''' may refer to:
*[[Wanted poster]], a poster put up to let the public know of a criminal whom authorities wish to apprehend *[[Fugitive]], a person wanted by law enforcement authorities. {{TOC right}} == Film == * [[Wanted! (1937 film)|''Wanted!'' (1937 film)]], a film starring [[ZaSu Pitts]] * [[Wanted (1961 film)|''Wanted'' (1961 film)]], a [[Bollywood films of 1961|Bollywood film of 1961]] * [[Wanted (1967 film)|''Wanted'' (1967 film)]], an Italian western * [[Wanted (1980 film)|''Wanted'' (1980 film)]], an American gay pornographic film * [[Wanted (1997 film)|''Wanted'' (1997 film)]], a film starring [[Steve Bastoni]] * [[Wanted (1999 film)|''Wanted'' (1999 film)]], a film starring [[Tracey Gold]] * [[Wanted (2004 film)|''Wanted'' (2004 film)]], an Indian Malayalam [[Mohanlal filmography#2004|film featuring Mohanlal]] * [[Wanted (2008 film)|''Wanted'' (2008 film)]], an American action film starring Angelina Jolie and James McAvoy; based on the comics series (see below) * [[Wanted (2009 film)|''Wanted'' (2009 film)]], a [[Bollywood]] film starring [[Salman Khan]] * [[Wanted (2010 film)|''Wanted'' (2010 film)]], an Indian Bangla film starring [[Jeet]] * [[Wanted (2011 film)|''Wanted'' (2011 film)]], a Telugu-language film * [[Wanted (2012 film)|''Wanted 2'' (2012 film)]], An American sequel action film starring Angelina Jolie and James McAvoy; based on the comic series
== Literature == *[[Wanted (comics)|''Wanted'' (comics)]], a comic book miniseries by Mark Millar and J. G. Jones *[[Wanted (manga)|''Wanted'' (manga)]], a Japanese manga series by Matsuri Hino *''Wanted!'', a Japanese manga by [[Eiichiro Oda]] *[[Wanted (The Hardy Boys)|''Wanted'' (The Hardy Boys)]], a novel in the Hardy Boys Undercover Brothers: Super Mysteries series *[[Wanted (Pretty Little Liars)|''Wanted'' (Pretty Little Liars)]], a novel in the ''Pretty Little Liars'' series
== Music == ;Albums *[[Wanted (Bow Wow album)|''Wanted'' (Bow Wow album)]] *[[Wanted (Cliff Richard album)|''Wanted'' (Cliff Richard album)]] *''[[Wanted! The Outlaws]]'', an album by Waylon Jennings, Willie Nelson, Jessi Colter, and Tompall Glaser *''[[Wanted (Yazz album)|''Wanted'' (Yazz album)]] *''Wanted'', an album by [[Mason Proffit]]
;Songs *[[Wanted (Alan Jackson song)|"Wanted" (Alan Jackson song)]] *[[Wanted (Jessie James song)|"Wanted" (Jessie James song)]] *[[Wanted (Perry Como song)|"Wanted" (Perry Como song)]], covered by other artists *"[[Wanted (Shimei Tehai)]]", a song by Pink Lady *"Wanted", a song by The Cranberries from ''[[Everybody Else Is Doing It, So Why Can't We?]]'' *"Wanted", a song by The Dooleys from ''[[The Chosen Few (The Dooleys album)|The Chosen Few]]'' *"Wanted", a song by Vanessa Carlton from ''[[Be Not Nobody]]'' *"Wanted", a song by Doogy degli Armonium (Franco Zulian & Vincenzo Stavolo)
;Artists *[[The Wanted]], an English/Irish boy band
== Television == *[[Wanted (TV series)|''Wanted'' (TV series)]], an American police drama *[[Wanted (TV show)|''Wanted'' (TV show)]], a Philippine public service program *[[Wanted (game show)|''Wanted'' (game show)]], a UK show on Channel 4 *[[Wanted (Only Fools and Horses)|"Wanted" (''Only Fools and Horses'')]], an episode of ''Only Fools and Horses''
== Video games== *''[[Wanted: Weapons of Fate]]'', a game based on the 2008 film *[[Wanted (2004 video game)|''Wanted'' (2004 video game)]], a [[Playstation 1]] game *''Wanted : A Wild West Adventure'', otherwise known as ''The Westerner'', a [[Personal Computer|PC]] and [[WiiWare]] game by [[Revistronic]]
